author: __lithp__
content:
I have some preliminary results for (2), I'm looking into how cold each touch is:

```
(turbo-api-examples) brian@pop-os:~/turbo-api-examples$ ./plot.py                                      
lastBlock=10980418
found all touches in this block. len=365
min=     1.000 max=     4.014 count=131
min=     4.014 max=    16.114 count=50
min=    16.114 max=    64.687 count=44
min=    64.687 max=   259.672 count=28
min=   259.672 max=  1042.392 count=10
min=  1042.392 max=  4184.441 count=11
min=  4184.441 max= 16797.463 count=57
min= 16797.463 max= 67429.498 count=13
min= 67429.498 max=270680.000 count=5
min=270680.000 max=       inf count=1
reads too old to track: 15
```

Each line is a bin. The first bin records every access which touches an account last touched 1-4 blocks ago, the next bin counts every access which touches an account last touched 5-16 blocks ago. I've only run it over the touches which happened in block 10980418, and I'm not able to attribute any touches which happened more than ~300000 blocks ago, and I was working off of a corrupted tg database so I don't have much confidence in this data. It's coming together though, once I have a fresh tg (which should be later today ðŸ¤ž ) I'll be able to re-run the analysis and come up with numbers I'm more sure of. This is interesting though if it's true! Just in a single block we're already found ~16 reads which access state last accesed 270k blocks ago
